mapper.sql: pk_artwork_id, fk_userId, artwork_name, artwork_describe, artwork_status, logo_path, last_create_date, last_modify_date, four_letter_tips, fk_audit_id

mapper.update:
update ecm_artwork
fk_userId = #{fkUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
artwork_name = #{artworkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
artwork_describe = #{artworkDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
artwork_status = #{artworkStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
logo_path = #{logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_create_date = #{lastCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
four_letter_tips = #{fourLetterTips,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_audit_id = #{fkAuditId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where pk_artwork_id = #{pkArtworkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ecm_artwork set fk_userId = #{fkUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, artwork_name = #{artworkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, artwork_describe = #{artworkDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, artwork_status = #{artworkStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, logo_path = #{logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_create_date = #{lastCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, four_letter_tips = #{fourLetterTips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_audit_id = #{fkAuditId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pk_artwork_id = #{pkArtworkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pk_artwork_id, fk_userId, artwork_name, artwork_describe, artwork_status, logo_path, last_create_date, last_modify_date, four_letter_tips,username,fk_audit_id from ecm_artwork a inner join ecm_user u on u.pk_user_id = a.fk_userId
and pk_artwork_id like CONCAT('%',#{pkArtworkId},'%')
and fk_userId like CONCAT('%',#{fkUserid},'%')
and artwork_status = #{artworkStatus}
and artwork_name like CONCAT('%',#{artworkName},'%')
and artwork_describe like CONCAT('%',#{artworkDescribe},'%')
and four_letter_tips like CONCAT('%',#{fourLetterTips},'%')
order by last_create_date desc limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(*) from ecm_artwork a inner join ecm_user u on u.pk_user_id = a.fk_userId
and pk_artwork_id like CONCAT('%',#{pkArtworkId},'%')
and fk_userId like CONCAT('%',#{fkUserid},'%')
and artwork_status = #{artworkStatus}
and artwork_name like CONCAT('%',#{artworkName},'%')
and artwork_describe like CONCAT('%',#{artworkDescribe},'%')
and four_letter_tips like CONCAT('%',#{fourLetterTips},'%')

select count(*) from ecm_artwork a inner join ecm_user u on u.pk_user_id = a.fk_userId artwork_status = 1
and pk_artwork_id like CONCAT('%',#{pkArtworkId},'%')
and fk_userId like CONCAT('%',#{fkUserid},'%')
and artwork_describe like CONCAT('%',#{artworkDescribe},'%')
and artwork_name like CONCAT('%',#{artworkName},'%')
and four_letter_tips like CONCAT('%',#{fourLetterTips},'%')

select pk_artwork_id, fk_userId, artwork_name, artwork_describe, artwork_status, logo_path, last_create_date, last_modify_date, four_letter_tips,username,fk_audit_id from ecm_artwork a inner join ecm_user u on u.pk_user_id = a.fk_userId artwork_status = 1
and pk_artwork_id like CONCAT('%',#{pkArtworkId},'%')
and fk_userId like CONCAT('%',#{fkUserid},'%')
and artwork_name like CONCAT('%',#{artworkName},'%')
and artwork_describe like CONCAT('%',#{artworkDescribe},'%')
and four_letter_tips like CONCAT('%',#{fourLetterTips},'%')
order by last_modify_date limit #{start},#{limit}

select from ecm_artwork
and pk_artwork_id like CONCAT('%',#{pkArtworkId},'%')
and fk_userId like CONCAT('%',#{fkUserid},'%')
and artwork_status = #{artworkStatus}
and artwork_name like CONCAT('%',#{artworkName},'%')
and artwork_describe like CONCAT('%',#{artworkDescribe},'%')
and four_letter_tips like CONCAT('%',#{fourLetterTips},'%')
order by last_create_date desc limit #{start},#{limit}
select from ecm_artwork where pk_artwork_id in #{id.fkArtworkId}
